snippet: KENNEDY--Michael. The Breast Cancer Research Foundation mourns the passing of Michael Kennedy, beloved husband of dear friend, longtime supporter and treasured member of the BCRF Leaders Council, Eleonora. Leonard A. Lauder, Honorary Chairman Larry Norton, M.D., Scientific Director Myra J. Biblowit, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: KENNEDY--Michael. The Breast Cancer Research Foundation mourns the passing of Michael Kennedy, beloved husband of dear friend, longtime supporter and treasured member of the BCRF Leaders Council, Eleonora. Leonard A. Lauder, Honorary Chairman Larry Norton, M.D., Scientific Director Myra J. Biblowit, President 1/3
